oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.data

Class FileInputDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.data.SimpleInputDataSet
      • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.data.FileInputDataSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationStorable, AbstractInputDataSet, IODataSet
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpatialIndexInputDataSet

    public class FileInputDataSet
extends SimpleInputDataSet
    Represents a file based data set. It can be used to represent any data set which information is contained in files from a local file system or HDFS.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

      • setInputString

        public void setInputString(java.lang.String inputString)
        Sets the location of the data set's files as a string. It is expected either of the following formats:
        1. A path to a file
        2. A comma separated list of file paths
        3. A regular expression such as file:///parent_folder/*.txt
        Parameters:
        inputString - a string containing the input data set's files

      • setPaths

        public void setPaths(Path[] paths)
        Sets the paths where the data set files are located
        Parameters:
        paths - an array of paths
